header.logo-alt: Flyo Logo, a stack of squares besides the writting of 'Flyo', all white

intro.img-alt: People organizing giant files inside a giant folder, simple art.
intro.desc-title: All your files in one secure location, accessible anywhere
intro.desc-body: Fylo stores all your most important files in one secure location. Access them wherever you need, share and collaborate with friends family, and co-workers.

features.img-desc: A neon outline of a computer and smart phone, light blue
features.title: Access your files, anywhere
features.body: The ability to use a smartphone, tablet, or computer to access your account means your files follow you everywhere.

features.img-desc: A abstract neon shield with a check mark inside it, light blue
features.title: Security you can trust
features.body: 2-factor authentication and user-controlled encryption are just a couple of the security features we allow to help secure your files.

features.img-desc: An abstract neon clock outline, with three tiny neon outline people, light blue
features.title: Real-time collaboration
features.body: Securely share files and folders with friends, family and colleagues for live collaboration. No email attachments required.

features.img-desc: A neon outline of a abstract folder, with a neon image and document besides it, light blue
features.title: Store any type of file
features.body: Whether you're sharing holidays photos or work documents, Fylo has you covered allowing for all file types to be securely stored and shared.

stay-productive.img-desc: Three persons holding speech bubbles around an abstract target
stay-productive.title:
Stay productive,
wherever you are
stay-productive.body:
Never let location be an issue when accessing your files. Fylo has you covered for all of your file storage needs.

Securely share files and folders with friends, family and colleagues for live collaboration. No email attachments required.

testimonials.body: Fylo has improved our team productivity by an order of magnitude. Since making the switch our team has become a well-oiled collaboration machine.
testimonials.author: Satish Patel

testimonials.body: Fylo has improved our team productivity by an order of magnitude. Since making the switch our team has become a well-oiled collaboration machine.

testimonials.body: Fylo has improved our team productivity by an order of magnitude. Since making the switch our team has become a well-oiled collaboration machine.

newsletter.title: Get early access today
newsletter.body: It only takes a minute to sign up and our free starter tier is extremely generous. If you have any questions, our support team would be happy to help you.
